Today is a big win for Nevada. @Interior has announced the commitment of more than $106.8 million to support critical public land projects here in Nevada. This promotes habitat conservation, improves our parks, and prepares Nevadan communities for wildfires.
While we won today, the fight isn’t over, and I will continue to protect the people of Nevada from dangerous and ill-advised efforts to store the nation’s nuclear waste in Nevada.

Today I led an effort with the entire Nevada delegation to kill an amendment to license and restart construction of a nuclear waste facility at Yucca Mountain. I am proud that the Committee heard our arguments against Yucca Mountain. This is a victory for all Nevadans.
